Title: Mother of the Bride
Starring:
Brooke Shields 
 Miranda Cosgrove 
 Benjamin Bratt
Production: In February 2023, Netflix announced a romantic comedy film written by Robin Bernheim and to be directed by Mark Waters was in pre-production. Brooke Shields, Miranda Cosgrove, Benjamin Bratt, Chad Michael Murray, Rachael Harris, Sean Teale, Wilson Cruz, Michael McDonald, Tasneem Roc, and Dalip Sondhi was added to the cast. Principal photography began in April 2023 in Phuket, Thailand.
Release: Mother of the Bride is scheduled to be released on Netflix on May 9, 2024.
